za.ac.wits.elen4010.fluidsim.mpiNodalCode

Interface MpiIO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FakedIO, TrueIO

    public interface MpiIO
    Interface for an MPI send and receive object which should be implemented by any object which perf- orms send/receive operations or fakes them
    See Also:
    TrueIO, FakedIO

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • mpiSend

        void mpiSend(java.lang.Object[] data,
           int offset,
           int count,
           Datatype dataType,
           int destination,
           int tag)
             throws MPIException
        Acts as the sending command for the class which implements the interface
        Parameters:
        data - The data which will be sent over the network in the format of a buffer of the ite- ms to be sent
        offset - The off set from the start of the buffer to begin sending from
        count - The number of items (starting at offset) to send
        dataType - An indicator for the datatype which was sent (i.e. the type found in the buffer)
        destination - The rank which should receive the command
        tag - The tag which defines the user specified message type
        Throws:
        MPIException

      • mpiReceive

        Status mpiReceive(java.lang.Object[] data,
                int offset,
                int count,
                Datatype dataType,
                int source,
                int tag)
                  throws MPIException
        Acts as the receiving command for the class which implements the interface
        Parameters:
        data - The data which will be sent over the network in the format of a buffer of the ite- ms to be sent
        offset - The off set from the start of the buffer to begin sending from
        count - The number of items (starting at offset) to send
        dataType - An indicator for the datatype which was sent (i.e. the type found in the buffer)
        source - The rank which sent the message
        tag - The tag which defines the user specified message type
        Returns:
        The status of the operation which contains important information such as the source a- nd tag fields
        Throws:
        MPIException

      • myRank

        int myRank()
           throws MPIException
        Returns the rank of current process
        Returns:
        The rank of the current process
        Throws:
        MPIException

      • commWorldSize

        int commWorldSize()
                  throws MPIException
        Returns the size of the communicator
        Returns:
        The size of the comm_world communicator
        Throws:
        MPIException

      • initProcess

        void initProcess(int commSize)
        Function to initialise the process
        Parameters:
        commSize - The size of the world communicator
        currentRank - The current process rank
